# in this file we cover magic comma for single element subscripts, removed in
# https://github.com/psf/black/pull/2942/files#diff-31972cba2ef33b6d8853302bec17d8c60e796566d67ce57e5d233f17a0c6f5a4R17-R18
import pandas as pd

# Magic comma when indexing. Should stay the same
full_worksheet_df = pd.DataFrame()
full_worksheet_df = full_worksheet_df[
    ["col1", "col2", *full_worksheet_df.columns[2:]],
]

# Lack of magic comma when indexing 2 dimensions. Should compress
full_worksheet_df = full_worksheet_df[
    "elem1",
    ["col1", "col2", *full_worksheet_df.columns[2:]]
]

# Magic comma when indexing 2 dimensions. Should stay the same
full_worksheet_df = full_worksheet_df[
    "elem1",
    ["col1", "col2", *full_worksheet_df.columns[2:]],
]
